article.Body:
As we approach the deadline to file the first round of GST returns, the GST Network Chairman has said that the pace of filings on the GST portal is still slow. Speaking to CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan earlier today, GST Network Chairman, Navin Kumar said that so far the GST portal has received only 16,000 returns. In this backdrop, the GSTN chairman urged taxpayers to not wait till the last day to pay tax  and file returns. However, he expressed confidence that system will be able to cope with last-minute rush to file returns.
